#generate .ll file
clang -S test.c -emit-llvm -o test.ll

#interpreter
lli test1.ll

#compile to native code
llc test.ll -o test.s
clang test.s -o test


# running parser
bison -d parser.y && flex lexer.l && g++ parser.tab.c lex.yy.c -ll && ./a.out < input


# running the .ll file generated by parser
clang test.c -S -emit-llvm -o test.ll && lli test.ll
